sentences.en: A few pedlar still contend for move and her to sign have exclusive selling rights contract.
sentences.cn: 有几个商贩还争着与她签订包销合同.

sentences.en: Every pedlar praises his own needles.
First he had to apply for a pedlar's certificate.
From the alleyway outside came the " tock - tock ! " of a dumpling - pedlar striking his bamboo tube.
sentences.cn: 衖 堂里馄饨担的竹筒托托地响了几下.

sentences.en: I buy to that book from flowing pedlar there.
sentences.cn: 我从流动小贩那里买到了那本书.

sentences.en: Let's have a talk with the pedlar.
sentences.cn: 我们去跟那个小贩谈谈 吧.

sentences.en: My grandmother dickered with the pedlar over the price of apples.
sentences.cn: 我祖母为苹果的价格与小贩讨价还价.

sentences.en: Pedlar plays tricks on the balance, this kind of thing almost everybody has been encountered.
sentences.cn: 商贩在秤上做手脚, 这种事几乎每个人都遇到过.

sentences.en: The pedlar beckoned me to follow him.
The pedlar clammed up when I mentioned the police.
sentences.cn: 我一提到警察小贩就不作声了.

sentences.en: The pedlar insisted on selling the apple of Sodom to the tourists.
sentences.cn: 这个小贩非要把假货卖给这些旅游者.

sentences.en: The pedlar sponged money off us.
sentences.cn: 那个小商贩骗了我们的钱.

sentences.en: The pedlar tried to sell me some small articles.
sentences.cn: 那个小贩试图卖给我一些小东西.

sentences.en: The tricky pedlar cheated the girl into giving him all her money.
sentences.cn: 狡猾的摊贩把小姑娘的钱全骗走了.

trans.tran_en: someone who, in the past, walked from place to place selling small things
